description:
I've been using eagle for quite a few years, I started to look elsewhere and landed on KiCad.
Had a lot of issues getting into the right state of mind, but after using it for a few years, it's my new home.
It's quick, its easy its just great.
I would recommend this to all electronics hobbyists and smaller companies.
This is a great EDA suit capable of very complicated designs.
After upgrade to 6.0 (bugs stops me to add parts) I decided to uninstall it.
Best Pcb Design software out there
KiCad has a nice schematics editor, which may be used as a Spice netlist generator and a frontend for Ngspice. It even supports plotting the analog waveforms!
Ideal for designing PCBs. Easy to use and not as complex as costly commercial.
Use it. Make a Donation! Great Tool

I produced circuits and PCB Layouts for an Electronics Magazine on a commercial app that simple became too costly and too controlling!
KiCAD has everything I want, and more importantly what I need, including the import function I needed!
No doubt I will find another star in my rating when I know it better!
Free, Great app
A complete, pretty much self-intuitive e-design suite.
No other choice when trying to stay open-source.
Full featured app for circuit development with big community

Wow, Previously I had the problem with 3D viewer said that my OpenGL version is too low. I had to install virtual mashine to use kicad. Now it seemed that the problem is solved. I am so glad to use it.

Its an excellent software package  and I mean every single word of this 

 You could not ask for more and worth every single penny to support this project  
The amount of money you would pay for this type of cad package would be phenominal and what you cant do with it and how you could use this to start manufacturing from home or produce designs is all accompished within
Perfect with Debian 12 KDE
Ngspice integration is very useful

Dear Admin, KiCAD lastest version is not rechable. The infomation is confuse for the version 7.0.9. How to donwload version 5.0? How to get old wiki documents? SPICE for basic and intermediate parts is not visible in KiCAD org.
Perfect Perfect Perfect
A great free electrical CAD software
It does a good job of the things I need it to do, and the community support means I can easily find solutions to problems.
Amazingly good and stable open source program! I'm always surprised how stable it is compared to some other popular linux programs, which keep to crash every now and then.
Absolut brauchbare Software! Und das unter Linux!

Nachdem ich nun 8 Platinen mit KiCad entworfen habe kann ich sagen, dass dies ein duchaus gut brauchbares Programm ist. Und, dass ich denke, dass es noch eine rosige Zukunft vor sich hat, wenn es sich so konsequent weiterentwickelt und gut auf die professionelleren Wünsche der Nutzer eingeht, wie es aktuell der Fall ist. 

Natürlich fehlen noch an vielen Stellen Sonderfunktionen zu Programmen die kommerziell vertrieben werden - um das allermeiste kann man allerding tatsächlich herumarbeiten, wenn man sich ein bisschan anpasst.

Meiner Erfahrung nach die Entwickler unheimlich bemüht auftretende Probleme auf dem Gitlab-issue-tracker zu verfolgen und auch bei akuten Problemen mit "nightly" Versionen zu helfen - wenn man sich die Mühe macht ordentliche Fehlerberichte zu verfassen.

Weiters o!
summary: Auf sehr gutem Weg - kontinuierliche Weiterentwicklung

description:
Muy buena y rapida, solo que al principio no encontraba los modelos 3D. Pero se soluciona facilmente con el siguiente comando:
sudo dnf install kicad-packages3d kicad-doc
Aun en maquinas core1 rinde bien
La verdad, mi vida era una basura hasta que conoci esta aplicacion, me curo mi fakin depresion diseñando circuitos y diviertiendome ocmo las uedrogas mne diviherten avefces
no me deja pedir comidad ni pal moro que tengo alado aaaaaaaaaa
It can do all that I need, and V6 schematics finally fixed most library sharing issues

Je l'utilise depuis 2013, elle ne cesse de s'améliorer, avec cette version je peux aussi faireb réaliser mon circuit imprimé (PCB) par un professionnel. La vue en 3D est très très pratique et très réaliste.

Suite de logiciels très complète et pratique à utiliser.
Un grand merci aux développeurs.
allego、pads好是好，可惜没有Linux支持，所以不好
